> **Legend** - [Click here to learn more](https://docs.codecov.io/docs/codecov-delta)
> `Δ = absolute <relative> (impact)`, `ø = not affected`, `? = missing data`
> Powered by [Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/willmcgugan/rich/pull/219?src=pr&el=footer). Last update [1501671...874a040](https://codecov.io/gh/willmcgugan/rich/pull/219?src=pr&el=lastupdated). Read the [comment docs](https://docs.codecov.io/docs/pull-request-comments).

This PR fixes the incorrect formatting of docstrings caused by not using escape sequence in normal strings. It removes an escape sequence used in raw strings and also changes raw strings to normal strings to prevent any confusion in the future.
